message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is there any flexibility on the price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1800000 is a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1600000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $1600000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. However, I'm not willing to go below $1500000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1520000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1480000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. Let's meet in the middle at $1440000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to make sure it's within my budget. Can you consider this price?

I understand your desire to get the product within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1460000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so let's meet at $1420000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $1350000, but no lower. I really need to finalize this deal today, so I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
